analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
bhikkhave lokasmi piṇḍolaḥ vicarasi patta pāṇī iti

original: Tañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṁ paṭicca;
analyzed: tat ca kho eta bhikkhave kula puttāḥ upenti atthavasikāḥ atthavasam paṭicca

original: neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā.
analyzed: na iva rāja abhinītā na cora abhinītā na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na ājīvikāpaka tā

original: Api ca kho ‘otiṇṇamhā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā,
analyzed: api ca kho otiṇṇamhā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇā dukkha paretā

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati
evam pabbajitaḥ ca āya bhikkhave kula putto

original: So ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo, byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo, muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
analyzed: saḥ ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibba sārāgaḥ byāpanna cittaḥ paduṭṭha mana saṅkappaḥ muṭṭha sati asampajānaḥ asamāhitaḥ vibbhanta cittaḥ pāka tindriyaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṁ ubhatopadittaṁ majjhe gūthagataṁ neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṁ pharati na araññe;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave chava alātam ubhatopadittam majjhe gūtha gatam na iva gāme kaṭṭhattham pharati na araññe

original: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi gihibhogā parihīno sāmaññatthañca na paripūretī”ti.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam puggalam vadāmi gihi bhogā parihīno sāmañña ttham ca na paripūreti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
